snippet.title: A Turn-Based Fighting Game (Mega Knockdown Gameplay Trailer)
snippet.description:
A fighting game where the action only moves when you do. Try the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1492750/Mega_Knockdown/

===

We remastered this trailer to include new full-color character art! Follow us in 2025 as we approach our 1.0 launch.

Voiceover by Tom Goldrick
